channel.title: MBallSectionsDR
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MBallSectionsDR, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: World Health Organization 'regrets' loss of U.S. support under Trump
item.description: The World Health Organization said Tuesday that it hopes President Trump will reconsider the U.S. pullout from the organization.

item.title: Stefanik pledges an 'America First' agenda at the U.N. and a review of U.S. funding

item.title: Rubio sworn in as secretary of state, vows to promote 'peace through strength'
item.description: Marco Rubio was sworn in as secretary of state on Tuesday, making him the first of President Trump's Cabinet picks to take office.

item.title: Joe Biden’s Final Corrupt Acts
item.description: History will not be kind to the 46th president.

item.title: Biden’s Parting Protectionist Folly
item.description: Now ex-president Biden’s decision to block the sale of U.S. Steel to a Japanese company is unjustifiable.

item.title: Trump fires four Biden officials, promises to ax 'many more'
item.description: President Trump kept his Day 1 actions going after midnight Monday by firing four presidential appointees from the Biden administration.

item.title: Schumer blasts Trump’s J6 pardons as ‘un-American’

item.title: Trump Uproots Biden DEI Initiatives From Federal Institutions, Starting With The Coast Guard
item.description: President Donald Trump slashed federal DEI. One of the first house-cleaning measures was firing Coast Guard Adm. Linda Lee Fagan.

item.title: 'New golden age': Anti-woke beer company teams up with 'MAGA Babe' influencers to launch new calendar

item.title: They Gave Trump the Center, and He Took It
item.description: Out of touch and radical Democrats made Trump look like the normal one.

item.title: Trump Declares ‘Energy Emergency’ To Reverse Biden’s Assault On U.S. Power Production
item.description: At least six out of dozens of executive actions delivered by the newly inaugurated president on Monday focused on energy or environment.

item.title: Republicans Led By Chip Roy Move To Repeal The Act Biden Used To Jail Peaceful Pro-Lifers
item.description: GOP Sen. Mike Lee, who has long stood with Roy in calling for the end of the Act, is expected to mirror the move in the upper chamber.

item.title: Reverend asks Trump to have 'mercy' on immigrants, LGBTQ children who 'fear for their lives'
item.description: A reverend pleaded President Trump to take "mercy" on immigrants and LGBTQ youth who are "scared for their lives" during the national prayer service.

item.title: 9 Ways Trump Started Securing The Border On His First Day
item.description: Here are nine actions Trump announced on his first day in office to start addressing the invasion at the southern border.

item.title: Democrats Hijack Doug Collins’ Confirmation Hearing To Push Extreme Abortion Agenda

item.title: SCOTUS Should Affirm Parents’ Right to Opt Out of Gender Ideology in Public Schools
item.description: Montgomery County parents have asked the Supreme Court to secure their right to protect their children from radical curricula. The Court should agree.
